intro: Biophytum rotundifolium, commonly known as the round-leaf biophytum, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its succulent, rounded leaves that are often covered in a fine, fuzzy texture. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in clusters during the warmer months. It is a member of the Aizoaceae family, known for its unique adaptations to arid environments. Biophytum rotundifolium is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and drought tolerance.
